modName: CBBE Low Weight Hand-Wrist Gap And Ankle-Foot Gap Fix
summary: Corrects the Low Weight Wrist Gap for CBBE
descriptionHtml:
Here is a NIF that has been edited to conform to the weight change under CBBE.

It replace the "femalehands_0.nif" in data\Meshes\Actors\character\character assets\

This also can be copied to any Follower/NPC. Just place "femalehands_0.nif" in the respective folder and overwrite or rename, E.G.:

data\Meshes\Actors\character\character assets\"follower directory"
OR
data\Meshes\Actors\character\character assets\"follower directory"\Hands

Some followers are slightly different so be sure to check the file structure.



MO users, place at the bottom on the left hand side so it doesn't get overwritten.
-------------------------------------------------

1.0 First release

1.0b Corrected file location

1.0c Correct file uploaded.
author: Watery Blaze AKA I-R-NOOB
